channel.title: AcquittalRSPS 317
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://www.acquittalrsps.net/image/tl.png[/img]
[URL=http://"https://twitter.com/AcquittalRSPS"][IMG]http://www.AcquittalRSPS.net/favicon.ico[/img][/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.AcquittalRSPS.net/"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"https://twitter.com/AcquittalRSPS"][IMG]http://www.YouTube.com/favicon.ico[/img][/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/AcquittalRSPS"]Youtube[/URL] [URL=http://"https://twitter.com/AcquittalRSPS"][IMG]https://www.Twitter.com/favicon.ico[/img][/URL] [URL=http://"https://twitter.com/AcquittalRSPS"]Twitter[/URL] [URL=http://"https://twitter.com/AcquittalRSPS"][IMG]http://www.acquittalrsps.net/image/play.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.AcquittalRSPS.net/play.html"]Play Now![/URL] [URL=http://"https://twitter.com/AcquittalRSPS"][IMG]http://www.acquittalrsps.net/image/forum.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.AcquittalRSPS.net/forum/index.php"]Community Forum[/URL]
[CENTER]AcquittalRSPS is a server that is designed for the player. AcquittalRSPS is an economy server, with loads of features including skills, bosses and minigames. You can do whatever pleases you on AcquittalRSPS, such as go questing, PvP with some of your friends, or maybe just hang and chat! The server is economized strategically so that no item that can be obtained by a boss or minigame, is in a shop. Another great concept is our PvP system. We have designed it so that when you kill someone, you get a random number out of 5, PvP Points. This provides the thrill we all loved when we k03d that special someone in the wilderness. We hope you enjoy your stay at AcquittalRSPS! What are you waiting for? [URL=http://"http://www.AcquittalRSPS.net/play.html"]Play Now![/URL][/CENTER]
Features:
Mage Following Range Following Clipped Projectiles Clipped Following Clipped Npcs Reworked Defence Formulas - PvP Reworked Attack Formulas - PvP & PvN Amazing Switching Rewritten Fishing Gem Cutting Improved Woodcutting Mining Smelting Smithing Fletching Herblore Agility Firemaking Crafting Fishing & Cooking Prayer Correct Drops PvP Point System PvP Point Shops Old School Styled Pest Control Barrows Great Dagganoth Caves Cook's Assistant Quest Slayer Skill with Slayer Gem Working Ice Queen Lair Chaos Elemental King Black Dragon Tzhaar Cave Correct Demon Models All Doors Working All Ladders Working Custom Donator Crown Working Custom Server Name Image in Chatbox New Friends & Ignore Lists ...And much more!
Media
Fish yourself an award! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0IkqZ.png[/img] Pick flax to sell to merchants! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SM3nJ.png[/img] Skill your way to victory! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8fYWf.png[/img] Many quests to come! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/89LL4.png[/img] Barrows, Barrows, Barrows Borthers is all I see! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sSpYi.png[/img] It's getting cold with all of these bosses! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BPdy1.png[/img] I'm tired of dying! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7thdO.png[/img] Woah... Fight pits?! Verse me, verse me! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ta9sg.png[/img] Cast your spells like a wizard! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S74ub.png[/img]
Enchant your path... Join today! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/niXKq.png[/img][/center]

item.title: AcquittalRSPS 317
item.dc:creator: @dawwn dawwn
item.description:
@dawwn wrote:

Really bad administrators, not sure they are capable of handling anything. I’ve found glitches and ways to do things out of the ordinary and when I was going to say how to fix it, an administrator ip banned me. Good luck getting all those dupe’s and exploits out your server when there’s no possible way to simply tell you without getting ip banned.

edit: also how much of a dumb ass is the poster to not notice the links are messed up? Don’t you have a clue they are messed up, it links to http://%22http//www.AcquittalRSPS.net/play.html%22

Read full topic

item.title: AcquittalRSPS 317
item.description:
@1500 wrote:

Loveandpower:

A real economy doesn’t depend on combat solely. Nor does it allow armor etc to be in the stores. Skillers etc sell the resources to make armor, sells crafted rune, sells the dragonhide armor, etc

+1 For you, this is how an economy server should be in my opinion. If you’re trying to create an economy by giving every starting player 1.5m, you’ll most likely fail sooner or later as people can get infinite amounts of money.

Read full topic

item.title: AcquittalRSPS 317
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

A real economy doesn’t depend on combat solely. Nor does it allow armor etc to be in the stores. Skillers etc sell the resources to make armor, sells crafted rune, sells the dragonhide armor, etc

item.title: AcquittalRSPS 317
item.dc:creator: @Dean313 Dean313
item.description:
@Dean313 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:6, topic:452469”][quote author=1500 link=topic=555349.msg4066197#msg4066197 date=1343915810]

AcquittalRSPS is an economy server

I wonder why you get 1.5m at the creation of your character. Could you explain why you get so much money?
[/quote]^ this

I honestly haven’t seen one “real” eco server yet on here…[/quote]

I think it’s okay. I was debating on having it lower with the other owner, but I thought it’d be fine where it is. Thanks for your feedback though!

*Update: Host has finished upgrading, and the website and forums are speedy.

Read full topic

item.title: AcquittalRSPS 317
item.dc:creator: @Dean313 Dean313
item.description:
@Dean313 wrote:

Soulcist:

Not bad of an advertisement, the “GOODBYE FAGEX” is childish though.

Thanks I suppose. I couldn’t think of anything else to match, since the servername we decided on was “Acquittal”

Scape-JAVA:

Might want to fix your links ;).

Our website is currently down because the host is upgrading PHP 5. We will be up momentarily. I guess I just had bad timing. :eek:

Read full topic

[CENTER]AcquittalRSPS is a server that is designed for the player. AcquittalRSPS is an economy server, with loads of features including skills, bosses and minigames. You can do whatever pleases you on AcquittalRSPS, such as go questing, PvP with some of your friends, or maybe just hang and chat! The server is economized strategically so that no item that can be obtained by a boss or minigame, is in a shop. Another great concept is our PvP system. We have designed it so that when you kill someone, you get a random number out of 5, PvP Points. This provides the thrill we all loved when we k03d that special someone in the wilderness. We hope you enjoy your stay at AcquittalRSPS! What are you waiting for? Play Now![/CENTER]
